repairedDockerfile:
FROM php:7.2.6-apache as builder

RUN apt-get update -y && \
    apt-get install --no-install-recommends -y build-essential -my wget gnupg && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;
RUN curl -f -sL https://deb.nodesource.com/setup_9.x | bash -

RUN apt-get update -y && \
        apt-get install --no-install-recommends -y git \
                       ruby-full \
                       nodejs \
                       npm \
                       automake \
                       libtool && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;
RUN mkdir -p /usr/local/etc \
  && { \
    echo 'install: --no-document'; \
    echo 'update: --no-document'; \
  } >> /usr/local/etc/gemrc;

RUN gem update --system && \
    gem install compass && rm -rf /root/.gem;
RUN npm install -g grunt-cli bower && npm cache clean --force;

RUN mkdir /dist
WORKDIR /dist

COPY package.json /dist
RUN npm install node-sass request@2.81.0 && npm cache clean --force;

RUN npm install && npm cache clean --force;

RUN echo '{ "allow_root": true }' > /root/.bowerrc
COPY bower.json /dist
RUN bower install

COPY . /dist
RUN grunt build

FROM php:7.2.6-apache

RUN ln -s /etc/apache2/mods-available/rewrite.load /etc/apache2/mods-enabled/rewrite.load

COPY --from=builder /var/www/html/ /var/www/html/

WORKDIR /var/www/html/
